alert.note: Alert for San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 5:43PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 630 PM MST... At 542 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Hilltop, or 14 miles northeast of Globe. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hilltop. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 265 and 280. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
